Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 12th overall pick, by Lynchburg in 1977...
Earned first career win on 4/9/1979...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Gashouse on 2/8/1985 to a 4-year deal worth $4,000,000 per year...
Traded from Gashouse to Halifax on 3/1/1987 (Going to GHG: CF M. Jimenez. Going to HAL: P C. Amburgey, P H. Outland)...
